subject: Heisman Trophy
College Athletics
Football
lead_paragraph: Reggie Bush, who won the Heisman Trophy in 2005 while at Southern California, took the unprecedented step of giving it back after revelations that he violated N.C.A.A. rules.
snippet: Reggie Bush, who won the Heisman Trophy in 2005 while at Southern California, took the unprecedented step of giving it back after revelations that he violated N.C.A.A. rules.
